nodes.text: for the more higher education like university, the students or their parents should pay for the fees
Some parents might not have enough money to pay for their children university fees
I don't think it is also fair for the government
the government has been paying a lot of money for their students' primary and secondary education
It is better for them to use the money to pay for the other students' education
all people in their country could receive the same education
students that already have a basic knowledge and education can get a part-time job
they can pay for their own studies when their parent could not afford to pay it
They will be more responsible with their studies when they pay the fees themselves
the students will become more independent
it will build their characters in the marketplace as well
this will encourage all the parents to think of the way to help their children to achieve more in their lives
they need to make some contribution too for their children future
government should not pay for the university fees
this will make both the parents and students in charge for their future themselves not just depend on the government to do all their responsibilities for them
